body.name: Sweetcrispy Dresser for Bedroom with 5 Drawers, Wide Chest of Drawers, Long Fabric Dresser, Storage Organizer Unit for Closet, Bedroom, Living Room, Hallway, Nursery, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 1 min

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Multipurpose Usage】 This premium clothes organizer mixes classic and modern designs, allowing it to blend seamlessly with any decor style in your home, and perfectly fit as a kid's dresser, baby dresser, bedroom dresser, closet dresser, and nursery dresser.

【Large Capacity】For easy storage, 2 sizes of storage space drawers are offered. These 5 foldable deep drawers are spacious enough to provide endless organizational possibilities. The wooden top of the dresser organizer is great for lamps, clocks, glasses, and other daily essentials, keeping them within your reach.

【Premium Material】This chest of drawers is equipped with premium metal rails and durable storage drawers. The tall dresser is made of high-quality MDF board material (Capacity: 66lb) and is not easy to deform. The surface of the wooden dresser is smooth and easy to clean.

【Sturdy and Safe Construction】The bedroom storage cabinet is equipped with a thickened and durable steel frame for long-lasting construction. It comes with triangular support bars and anti-tipping accessories to prevent accidents.

【Assemble & Service】The packaging is equipped with instructions and an accessories bag, which allows only about 20 minutes to assemble your fabric dresser with detailed instructions and the installation video. If you have encountered any problems, we would be delighted to help you find a solution and reply to your email within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like pic and yeah it’s short
reviews.reviewText: I measured this against my wall before I ordered so I was aware how short it would be once out together. And yeah, it’s short short. Which is fine, I got it to put in my closet under my hanging clothes and this was one of the better options based on measurements. Once it was put together I let it air out for a day before I put anything in it, my husband said it smelled funny but I didn’t really notice any strong odors from it.The fabric drawers are sturdy, the handles are screwed in so they’re also pretty sturdy. The drawer bottoms have an insert so I think they’ll be sturdy and hold up over time, but we shall see.It was very easy to assemble. The instructions are easier to follow than most IKEA items. I was not missing any pieces or parts and there was an “extra screw” packet in with my stuff so that was helpful.Overall…. this was a cheap purchase for a quick solution to a problem and I’m happy with my purchase. It’s cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very small for babies or toddlers clothes
reviews.reviewText: This sits close to the ground. I use it for my 4 year olds socks, underwear, pjs and tee shirts and it’s perfect for that. And his hat, gloves etc. it’s very small and easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice simple dresser… it’s short tho
reviews.reviewText: For the most part, this dresser was easy to put together even tho I put the middle piece in the wrong spot at first lol. Didn’t take too long. Only issue I have is it’s short. I’m realizing most items on Amazon and a few other sites are starting to sell furniture that is getting shorter and shorter…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars False Advertising Ridiculously Small - DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: When I used the VR function this item looked like it would be the perfect size for my 15 y/o stepsons room. In actuality this item is a joke especially for what I paid for it. There is absolutely no scenario when this “dresser” could be a useful item. DO NOT BUY THIS. I will definitely be sending back for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was really surprised when it first got here. It was smaller than I had pictured in my mind. However, it is the correct size, I just didn’t expect it to be so small. The drawers are great and deep as described. I love the look and that it is so lightweight, making it easy to move to wherever I need it. Easy to clean and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not wide enough
reviews.reviewText: The drawers are a bit narrow and they don’t hold lots of stuff, good for small item and makeup!Assembly was easy and it is sturdy enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best buy in a long time.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, I will be honest, I expected very little for quality. Thankfully I was EXTREMELY surprised. The stand came quickly, it was in great condition, all the parts were there, no rips or damage. I had read some reviews on putting it together could take some time so was even more pleasantly surprised that doing it alone only took me 45 minutes and only because I put in one of the braces backwards. It not only is sturdy but looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just love this product and style
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this fabric drawer cabinet option. I have purchased 6 so far and as my funds permit, I will replace ALL of my heavy, wooden, dressers, end tables, sofa tables and office cabinets/file cabinets with these. I’m getting up in the years, live alone and have no one to help me move heavy furniture. These are SO EASY to assemble and lightweight enough to move. The drawers are so big and can hold so much of whatever it is you want to store. For my master bedroom, I bought all white so I can paint and decorate them to fit my bedroom scheme. I could NOT be happier.
